data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 5, Dae Yong Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Ulsan Hyundai have an attacking throw-in.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Kim Tae-hwan of Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Dae Yong Kim signals a Gwangju throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
In the minute 21, Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Can Ulsan Hyundai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ulsan Hyundai to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Junior Negrao for Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Free kick Gwangju.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
In the minute 28, Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 32, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Gwangju.
Yoon Bit-garam scores to make it 1-0 at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Won Du-jae instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Goal! Junior Negrao extends Ulsan Hyundai's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Sin Jin-ho.
In the minute 38, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
Dae Yong Kim awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Dae Yong Kim will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 46, Kim Do-Hoon (Ulsan Hyundai) is making a first substitution, with Lee Keun-ho replacing Seol Young-woo.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 50, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Dae Yong Kim signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 54, Dae Yong Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 63, Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Chung-Yong Lee is replacing Sin Jin-ho for the home team.
In the minute 68, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
In the minute 69, Dae Yong Kim signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Ulsan Hyundai's area.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Ulsan.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Gwangju.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Park Jin Seob is making the team's first substitution at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium with Kim Hyo-gi replacing Eom Won-sang.
Free kick Gwangju.
In the minute 75, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Can Gwangju capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Dae Yong Kim signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Ulsan Hyundai's area.
In the minute 76, Dae Yong Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
In the minute 78, Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
Kim Chang-su is replacing Lee Eu-ddeum for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Ulsan Hyundai's Junior Negrao breaks free at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
In the minute 79, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gwangju advance rapidly upfield but Dae Yong Kim blows for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Ulsan Hyundai in Ulsan.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai make their third substitution with Lee Dong-kyeong replacing Junior Negrao.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 86, Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Choi Jun-hyeok is on a sub for Kim Jeong-hwan for Gwangju.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Ulsan Hyundai extend their lead to 3-0 through Lee Dong-kyeong.
Lee Keun-ho with an assist there.
